section.body: Either you're the Space player, or a Knight. Space player breeds the Frogs, Knight basically does a game long escort quest to help out.

section.header: My friends keep dying, how am I supposed to be protecting them?
section.body: Generally, the best way to protect your friends while playing SBURB is through whatever your aspect is. Breath or Time or whatever the fuck. Do a few quests on your planet and you'll get a feel for how it works.

section.header: Uh, I heard that the Knight was supposed to help me breed frogs, but *I* am the Knight.
section.body: Oh man, sucks to be you, dude. Looks like you're on your own. Good luck!

section.header: Where does SBURB even come up with these shitty classes? What even IS a Knight?
section.body: I'm pretty sure it's like, narrative archetypes and shit. Knights quest and protect and slay beasts and stuff. Try doing that kind of stuff.

section.header: WHY THE FUCK ARE THERE SO MANY QUESTS ON MY PLANET?
section.body: Welcome to Knighthood, bro. Quests are just something Knights do. Get ready to help the Space player, too. Quests for days.

section.header: I really fucking hate the Space Player.
section.body: Suck it up. Without them, you can't beat the game. Just try to ignore them and get their quests out of the way as fast as possible.

section.header: It seems that I have rolled Knight. What should I do?
section.body: Go punch enemies in the snout. And probably check on the Space player once in a while.
